about_the_game:
The future of Card Games is here, and it all starts in the floating city of Azhur.

Azhur is a Cyberpunk-themed Competitive Card Game with a fresh spin on the classic genre. Customize your ideal 15-Hex Card deck and compete head to head against the mightiest figures of the city for control and influence over its raging streets.

Unique Mechanics

Each Azhur Card comes in Hexes, packed with up to ten different Effects to facilitate any kind of strategy and playstyle.

But picking the right Hex during your turn is only the first step to victory. With four (4) different Areas, thirty (30) different Tiles to choose from, and a Rotation Mechanic that allows you to change the direction of your Hex Cards, proper card positioning is essential to win.

Vast Collection

Swarm your opponents or patiently wait to counter their mistakes -

with five available factions, 125 unique hex cards, and the option to combine cards from different factions, you can create your ideal deck and test your strategy out on the field.

Current Features

- Singleplayer

- Local Multiplayer

- Tutorials

Future Additions

In the future, we plan on adding:

- Online Multiplayer

- Singleplayer Campaigns

- Draft Mode

- and many more…

Why we don't include Online Multiplayer in this Release

Our primary goal is the community’s experience. Before plugging Azhur to the Net, we want to ensure that there’s an active community ready to play, making sure there is enough action in Azhur’s streets instead of endless waiting times. Once this is achieved, Azhur will be plugged into the Internet and the real battles will begin.
